alert.note: Alert for Lake; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 3:33PM EST until February 17 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected including a likely period of freezing rain or freezing drizzle this evening. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Lake IN and Porter Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Confidence in lake effect snow accumulations late tonight is low. If lake effect snow were to develop, the Advisory may need to be extended into the Friday morning commute time.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1- 800-261-7623.
